text: Akarorero, ni bamwe bahawe igitabu c’Imana gitagatifu ca Taurati hanyuma ntiba cakira mu kugikoresha, ni nk’indogobwe yikoreye ibitabu bininiya kuriyo ata gahengwe kuriyo, aka n’akarorero kabi cane k’abantu bahakanye amajambo y’Imana matagatifu nayo Imana ntirongora abantu bahemukiye imitima yabo
